reviewText: Have not had a chance to watch videos, thus do not know condition, but did receive quickly.
I gave this as a gift and was told this is a great movie and gift set. The recipients were in their mid 20's.

I purchased this set as a gift for my boyfriend and he loves it!  The set is very nice and includes not only the episodes, but also the previews and recaps.  Additionally, the set has episodes you can watch with director commentaries.  For a huge Entourage fan, this was a big bonus.

My son wanted this for Christmas, so I bought it and found out afterword that he already had seasons 1 & 2.  I kept the first 2 seasons, and have thoroughly enjoyed seasons 1 & 2, and await his return from college so that I can watch season 3.
Got the set quickly and in great condition and the show it amazing recomended for anyone that has time to sit down and watch it
